attributes.title: watermelon sugar no
attributes.review: i honestly thought this app was a joke. it came to my attention, unfortunately, that it was not. i was appalled, i have no words. the texts and emails just kept coming and it almost broke my phone. i just wanted to support the president mr.trump 🇺🇸 i don’t want to anymore after downloading. it’s honesty the worst decision i have ever made. don’t download this, don’t even think about it. buy chocolate instead, chocolate is actually good.
attributes.userName: mom pick me up, im scared

attributes.title: -1 review
attributes.review: honestly i was excited about this app. i felt it was a good recourse to have when trying to support my president. that was until i had some TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES. first it wouldn’t let me put in my phone number. it just keptAUTOMATICALLY  filling in the number “267-376-9386” and it WOULD NOT LETME  CHANGE IT it had to delete the app, download it again and have my son help me set it up. after getting all logged in with my correct phone number i received a message from the app with a link. the message stated that the link would give me extra alerts for nearby rallies as soon as possible and find me great deals on maga merch (that’s what my son calls it LOL) as soon as i clicked on the link, my phone glitched and opened to a PORN VIDEO of a very small white man (maybe 3’2”) SMACKING THE V*GINA of a LARGE-BREAST MEXICAN WOMAN. i was ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTED and wanted that wall to be built then and there. i IMMEDIATELY deleted the app after that and blocked the app’s number. TERRIBLE APP. TOO MANY GLITCHES. they at least need to have a manager on standby to help with these problems!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤢🤢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can support my aMaZiNg president🥴buttttt when it asked for my number it spammed me with messages and it almost made my phone shut down.😡 I do not recommend this app to ANYONE and as a devoted Christian ⛪️ I rEaLly am sad to have to write this sad review but it is the truth. 😖When my daughter, Angie, opened the app in her phone she said it was also just stupid and he should have at least picked better colors for the theme. If for whatever reason I download this app again I will make sure to look for improvements. I can’t say I had REALLY high expectations but I was expecting better. Like I said before if you don’t want your phone to shut down from ALOT of messages from a number that you don’t really know who is texting from a advise you not to download this app and to just remove trump from your life altogether. I also was REALLY looking forward to going to the latest trump event that was alllllllll over the news butttt I had to water my dog’s poop. I hope I can come along next time with my 100000 member family and that there is nothing to stop us. I will like to thank my daughter and my son for helping me see the light and for helping me get rid of the tacky app. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. Like I said before I am a Christian and I think that I should be able to carry a gun if I want to🔫🔫(*𝓫𝓪𝓷𝓰 𝓫𝓪𝓷𝓰*) but I do not like this president nor this app anymore. Thank you for taking your time and reading this. I hope our next president does not look like a Cheeto puff but also is just better in general.😬Love ya❤️

attributes.title: Really bad
attributes.review: Really bad app, very glitchy, slow, and has constant malfunctions.it asked for my phone number and as soon as I put it in I got SO MANY SPAM CALLS. It was so bad I had to put my phone on mute and clear notifications constantly. I was forced to get a new phone number because of the spam. DO NOT GET!!!

attributes.title: I suppose I should start by saying this app sucks🙈✨🧚
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and I was spammed with messages and calls 🦐🤏❤️🥺✨🧚👀 but the president is dead 🥺 #RIPTRUMP

attributes.title: so bad terrible app
attributes.review: this app is so ugly i hate the way it looks and i'm so mad that this is on the appstore because trump is a person that exudes and represents hate, sexism, racism, misogyny, r*pe, pedophilia, and ugly! he should not be allowed to have an app, let alone have rights.🤬🤬😠😠🙄👎
